metadata.dcterms:title: Sitatunga microsatellite DNA genotypes from the Mayanja River area of Uganda, 2015 - 2018
metadata.dcterms:creator: Boyce, Mark
Warbington, Camille
metadata.dcterms:description: Microsatellite DNA genotypes from sitatunga (Tragelaphus spekii) samples collected in the Mayanja River area of central Uganda, 2015-2018.
metadata.dcterms:subject: Medicine, Health and Life Sciences
